channel.title: Posts on Tony Duan
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Tony Duan

item.title: 三亚 | Sanya
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) ## Loading required package: ggplot2 location=geocode("Sanya", source = "dsk") ## Information from URL : http://www.datasciencetoolkit.org/maps/api/geocode/json?address=Sanya&sensor=false lon=location$lon lat=location$lat m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=lon, lat=lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=lon, lat=lat, popup="Sanya") m {"x":{"options":{"crs":{"crsClass":"L.CRS.EPSG3857","code":null,"proj4def":null,"projectedBounds":null,"options":{}}},"calls":[{"method":"addTiles","args":["//{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",null,null,{"minZoom":0,"maxZoom":18,"tileSize":256,"subdomains":"abc","errorTileUrl":"","tms":false,"noWrap":false,"zoomOffset":0,"zoomReverse":false,"opacity":1,"zIndex":1,"detectRetina":false,"attribution":"© OpenStreetMap contributors, CC-BY-SA"}]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[18.24306,109.505,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"Sanya",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]}],"setView":[[18.24306,109.505],5,[]],"limits":{"lat":[18.24306,18.24306],"lng":[109.505,109.505]}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

item.title: Pydata HK meetup
item.description: My first Pydata meetup @The Hong Kong Polytechnic University: Event:https://www.meetup.com/PyData-Hong-Kong/events/254406736/ Discovering Frequent Patterns in Time Series through Unsupervised Data Mining Techniques: the Case of the Energy Profiling in Buildings by Engineer Marco Savino Piscitelli Write Better Python Code by Mr. Anthony Chiu

item.title: 【數字‧你懂的】從蘋果iPhone看美中貿易逆差
item.description: Please advise to remove immediately if any infringement caused Apple become the first US company with market cap >1T USD after a strong 2018Q3 earning when stock price go up to $200 per share PetroChina is the first company market cap >1T USD at 2007 but it decrease to 200B until today China export 61M iphones worth $15B to US in 2017 which contribute 5% of total US-China trade deficit $375B $1000 iphoneX manufacture cost is $350 and 5% of it contribute by China ,mainly battery and assembly Reference https://www.

item.title: How AI can save our humanity by Kai-Fu Lee | 李开复：人工智能将拯救人类
item.description: Kai-Fu Lee presented TED talk at Aug13 2018. US invent and China apply China 2017 18 Trillon USD transaction was made by mobile payment bigger than total China 2017 GDP ,13 Trillon.

item.title: Decision Tree model in python
item.description: import pacakges and load iris dataset from sklearn.datasets import load_iris from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split from sklearn import tree from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score iris = load_iris() print (iris.feature_names) # metadata: names of the features ## ['sepal length (cm)', 'sepal width (cm)', 'petal length (cm)', 'petal width (cm)'] print (iris.target_names) # metadata: names of the different types of flowers ## ['setosa' 'versicolor' 'virginica'] X = iris.data # features y = iris.target # labels X_train is train features and X_test is test features

item.title: KNN model in python
item.description: 1.Get:import pacakges and load iris dataset from sklearn.datasets import load_iris from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split from sklearn.neighbors import KNeighborsClassifier from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score iris = load_iris() 2.Clean X_train is train features and X_test is test features. y_train is train label and y_test is test label. with 0.3 splict, we have 70% obs(105) for training and 30% obs(45) for testing. print (iris.feature_names) # metadata: names of the features ## ['sepal length (cm)', 'sepal width (cm)', 'petal length (cm)', 'petal width (cm)'] print (iris.

item.title: Machine Learning over Coffee with Josh Gordon
서울 | Seoul
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) ## Loading required package: ggplot2 #location=geocode( "Seoul" ) lon=127.00175 lat=37.53555 m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=lon, lat=lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=lon, lat=lat, popup="Seoul") m {"x":{"options":{"crs":{"crsClass":"L.CRS.EPSG3857","code":null,"proj4def":null,"projectedBounds":null,"options":{}}},"calls":[{"method":"addTiles","args":["//{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",null,null,{"minZoom":0,"maxZoom":18,"tileSize":256,"subdomains":"abc","errorTileUrl":"","tms":false,"noWrap":false,"zoomOffset":0,"zoomReverse":false,"opacity":1,"zIndex":1,"detectRetina":false,"attribution":"© OpenStreetMap contributors, CC-BY-SA"}]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[37.53555,127.00175,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"Seoul",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]}],"setView":[[37.53555,127.00175],5,[]],"limits":{"lat":[37.53555,37.53555],"lng":[127.00175,127.00175]}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} K POP at the Airport Ginseng Chicken Soup A TWOSOME PLACE very nice coffee shop. Korean BBQ beef

item.title: 臺北 | Taipei

item.title: Migrate to Hugo from Jekyll
item.description: Move static content to static Jekyll has a rule that any directory not starting with _ will be copied as-is to the _site output. Hugo keeps all static content under static. You should therefore move it all there. With Jekyll, something that looked like ▾ <root>/ ▾ images/ logo.png should become ▾ <root>/ ▾ static/ ▾ images/ logo.png Additionally, you’ll want any files that should reside at the root (such as CNAME) to be moved to static.
